title: Divers Discover Piece of Space Shuttle Challenger Off Florida Coast
description: The discovery came 36 years after the shuttle exploded over the Atlantic Ocean, killing all seven crew members on board, in one of the worst accidents of the American space program.
dc:creator: Eduardo Medina
media:description: The underwater explorer and marine biologist Mike Barnette and Jimmy Gadomski, a wreck diver, exploring a piece of the space shuttle Challenger that the team found in the waters off the coast of Florida. The Challenger exploded after its launch in 1986, killing all seven crew members.
